review.title: “Shortwhile employment”
review.pros: Pros – Company has given my salary on time
review.cons: Cons – Company location is too far in Sungai Long Cheras and training period is too short
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The management should give the employees more time to be trained on their tasks given and not too short period for them to understand the work scope as well to add more staff to handle the high volume of works.
